tit.cmt: 「Kyogokunomiya Imperial Prince Kinhito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Kyogoku-no-miya Kinhito』と、他の親王名と統一するために変更しました。

sen.j: 京極宮公仁親王（きょうごくのみや きんひとしんのう、享保18年1月5日 (旧暦)（1733年2月18日） - 明和7年6月22日 (旧暦)（1770年7月14日））は江戸時代中期の日本の皇族。
sen.e: Kyogokunomiya Imperial Prince Kinhito (February 18, 1733 – July 14, 1770) was a member of the Imperial family in the middle of the Edo period.
Imperial Prince Kyogoku-no-miya Kinhito (February 18, 1733 – July 14, 1770) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the middle of the Edo period.
sen.cmt: 下記のとおり変更、修正しました。・「Kyogokunomiya Imperial Prince Kinhito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Kyogoku-no-miya Kinhito』・「in the middle of the Edo period」 ⇒ 『who lived in the middle of the Edo period』
sen.e: Imperial Prince Kyogoku-no-miya Kinhito (February 18, 1733 – July 14, 1770) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the middle of the Edo period.
He was the ninth family head of the Kyogoku no Miya (also known as Katsura no Miya) family.
He was the ninth family head of the Kyogoku-no-miya (also known as Katsura-no-miya) family.
sen.cmt: ・「the Kyogoku no Miya」 ⇒ 『the Kyogoku-no-miya』に変更しました。・「Katsura no Miya」 ⇒ 『Katsura-no-miya』に変更しました。
sen.e: He was the ninth family head of the Kyogoku-no-miya (also known as Katsura-no-miya) family.

sen.j: 京極宮家仁親王の第1王子。
sen.e: He was the first imperial prince of the Kyogokunomiya Imperial Prince Yakahito.
He was the first son of Imperial Prince Kyogoku-no-miya Yakahito.
sen.cmt: ・「the first imperial prince」 ⇒ 『the first son』に修正しました。（人々から見て「皇子=imperial prince」ですが、京極宮家仁親王との続柄は「息子＝son」)・「the Kyogokunomiya Imperial Prince Yakahito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Kyogoku-no-miya Yakahito』に変更しました。
sen.e: He was the first son of Imperial Prince Kyogoku-no-miya Yakahito.

sen.j: 幼称は若宮、後、寛保元年（1741年）胡佐麿（こさまろ）と改称する。
sen.e: He was called Wakamiya when young, and in 1741, he changed his name to Kosamaro.
He was called Wakamiya when young, and in 1741, he changed his name to Kosamaro.
He was called Wakamiya when young, and in 1741, he changed his name to Kosamaro.

sen.j: 寬保2年（1742年）桃園天皇の猶子となる。
sen.e: In 1742, he was adopted by the Emperor Momozono.
In 1742, he was adopted by the Emperor Momozono.
In 1742, he was adopted by the Emperor Momozono.

sen.j: 延享2年（1745年）2月親王宣下を受け、公仁と命名される。
sen.e: In March 1745, he was given the title of the Imperial Prince and was named Kinhito.
In March 1745, he was given the title of the Imperial Prince and was named Kinhito.
In March 1745, he was given the title of the Imperial Prince and was named Kinhito.

sen.j: 同月元服して上総国に任ぜられる。
sen.e: In the same month, he celebrated his coming of age and was entrusted with Kazusa Province.
In the same month, he celebrated his coming of age and was entrusted with Kazusa Province.
In the same month, he celebrated his coming of age and was entrusted with Kazusa Province.

sen.j: 同年12月三品に叙せられる。
sen.e: In December the same year, he was designated as Sanbon (the third rank of the Imperial Princes'rank).
In the same year, he was designated as Sanbon (the third rank of the Imperial Princes'rank).
sen.cmt: 「In December the same year」 ⇒ 『In the same year』に修正しました。（理由→「同年（延享2年）12月」に一致する西暦1745年の正確な月の記載がないので、Decemberは削除しました。
sen.e: In December of the same year, he was designated as Sanbon (the third rank of the Imperial Princes'rank).
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴の12月を入力しました。

sen.j: 宝暦3年（1753年）12月二品に昇叙。
sen.e: In December 1753, he was promoted to Nihon (the second rank of the Imperial Princes' rank).
In 1753, he was promoted to Nihon (the second rank of the Imperial Princes' rank).
sen.cmt: 上記と同じ理由で、'December'を削除しました。
sen.e: In December 1753, he was promoted to Nihon (the second rank of the Imperial Princes' rank).
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴の12月を入力しました。

sen.j: 翌宝暦4年（1754年）閑院宮直仁親王の第3王女室子女王と結婚し、家仁親王から家督を譲られる。
sen.e: In 1754, he got married to Princess Shitsuko, the third princess of Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Naohito, and succeeded to the family from Imperial Prince Yakahito.
In 1754, he got married to Princess Shitsuko, the third daughter of Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Naohito, and succeeded to the family from Imperial Prince Yakahito.
sen.cmt: ・「the third princess」 → 『the third daughter』 に変更しました。（「第3王女」の王女とは、閑院宮直仁親王から見て、princess と言うより「娘＝daughter」です。）・「Kaninnomiya Imperial Prince Naohito」 → 『Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Naohito』 に変更しました。
sen.e: In 1754, he got married to Princess Shitsuko, the third daughter of Imperial Prince Kanin-no-miya Naohito, and succeeded to the family from Imperial Prince Yakahito.

sen.j: 宝暦6年（1756年）室子女王が薨去し、宝暦9年（1759年）紀州徳川家の徳川宗直の女寿子と再婚する。
sen.e: In 1756, Princess Shitsuko died and in 1759, he remarried Toshiko, a daughter of Munenao TOKUGAWA from Kishu Tokugawa family.
In 1756, Princess Shitsuko died and in 1759, he remarried Toshiko, a daughter of Munenao TOKUGAWA from the Kishu Tokugawa family.
sen.cmt: 「Kishu Tokugawa family」 → 『the Kishu Tokugawa family』と、theを追加しました。
sen.e: In 1756, Princess Shitsuko died and in 1759, he remarried Toshiko, a daughter of Munenao TOKUGAWA from the Kishu Tokugawa family.
He passed away in 1770.
He passed away in 1770.
He passed away in 1770.
He died at the age of 38.
He died at the age of 38.
He died at the age of 38.
His homyo (a posthumous Buddhist name) was Shojokan-in.
sen.cmt: 「清浄観院」正しい読み方が不明です。
sen.e: His homyo (a posthumous Buddhist name) was Shojokan-in.
His homyo (a posthumous Buddhist name) was Shojokan-in.

sen.j: 親王は、王子女に恵まれなかった。
sen.e: The Imperial Prince did not have many children.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Imperial Prince did not have many children.
The Imperial Prince did not have many children.

sen.j: 実子は、最初の妃であった室子女王との間に儲けた在子（ますこ）女王（後に一橋治済室）一人だけであった。
sen.e: His only biological child was Princess Masuko (later the wife of Harusada HITOTSUBASHI) by his first wife Princess Shitsuko.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: His only biological child was Princess Masuko (later the wife of Harusada HITOTSUBASHI) by his first wife Princess Shitsuko.
His only biological child was Princess Masuko (later the wife of Harusada HITOTSUBASHI) by his first wife Princess Shitsuko.

sen.j: 親王没後、寿子妃を当主として宮家は維持された。
sen.e: After the death of the Imperial Prince, the family was maintained with Toshiko as the family head.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: After the death of the Imperial Prince, the family was maintained with Toshiko as the family head.
After the death of the Imperial Prince, the family was maintained with Toshiko as the family head.

sen.j: しかし、寛政元年（1789年）に寿子妃が死去し、宮家は空主となった。
sen.e: However in 1789 Toshiko died and the Miyake (families allowed to have the status of Imperial family) lost its head.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However in 1789 Toshiko died and the Miyake (families allowed to have the status of Imperial family) lost its head.
However in 1789 Toshiko died and the Miyake (families allowed to have the status of Imperial family) lost its head.
